education.institution: University of Puerto Rico at Mayagüez

highlights: Collaborated with electrical engineers to program a bread proofer, PLC interface for Holsum's bread assembly line.
Utilized bit addressing to map each function on the bread proofing screen to the PLC.
Designed the buttons and the various screen tabs displayed on the panel which allowed the employees to control the bread proofing ovens.
Placed in charge of distributing and shipping various PLC equipment parts to other engineering companies.
Checked the part numbers for each item to ensure that the boxes being sent contained the correct equipment.
If any packages were incomplete, ordered the corresponding replacement with the part numbers and scheduled them for the next packages sent out.
Tutored university students enrolled in a pre-university mathematics course over the summer.
Gave lectures, used the Professor's course book, supplementary material, and thoroughly went over problems with the students to ensure they grasped the concepts.
work.company: University of Puerto Rico at Bayamón

projects.name: Sudoku GUI/Backtracking Algorithm Visualizer
projects.description: Developed an interactive Sudoku GUI which allows users to not only play the game, but visualize how the computer utilizes the backtracking algorithm in order to solve the randomly generate puzzle.

projects.name: Embedded Systems Elevator Project
projects.description: Alongside members of the RUMarino embedded division, utilizing two Arduinos serially connected to a laptop, hosted a system of virtual elevators. Controlled via a Python interface on the laptop.

projects.name: Discord Bot
projects.description: Created a discord bot that supports a variety of multimedia commands, interacts with users, displays detailed statistical information on COVID-19, and more. Hosted on a Raspberry Pi 3.
